website_summaries.verdict: The most advanced water saving smart sprinkler controller on the market.
pros: Ultra modern and sleek unit with touch screen controls
Utilizes multiple leading weather data sources to calculate the perfect volume of water
Displays detailed information and in-depth graphs
cons: An exceptional, but high priced smart sprinkler controller

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, intuitive and user-friendly setup
customer_reviews.text: My 15th century abacus sprinkler system had a total of four zones. With remodeling, I may need close to 10 zones, so this works perfectly. The advanced setup features are quite helpful in managing water usage, while allowing the green space to provide both curb and staycation appeal. (Yeah, thanks to the pandemic, I won’t be putting on my walk-about shoes anytime soon). The attached photos provide some details of the controller. The feature that I like best is that it works seamlessly with Apple HomeKit. I will provide further updates once it is connected and controlling the sprinklers.
customer_reviews.author: Andy in ATL

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC CUSTUMER SUPPORT
customer_reviews.text: I now have two Touch HD 16s. They work incredibly well. One of them was taken out by lightning this past Fall but I didn't know this until spring when we opened the system. RainMachine stood by the warranty and immediately sent a replacement. Their remote access by tech support found that it was dead in a few minutes and I was never even on hold! I will buy from them again not only because of great products but also because of their unequaled support.
customer_reviews.author: cacook

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: I have three of these units all 16 zone. They've work flawlessly for several years. Except by my mistake I cooked one in the sun, it got real hot, and quit running the program though the display still worked. Rain Machine repaired it for $30.00. The cost of parts and shipping. they do not charge for labor. I also learned that one circuit can handle 1/2 amp for heavier loads such as a fountain pump or low voltage lighting. Tuning into the weather service NOAA has saved me thousands of gallons of water and dollars in reduced water needs. Important in central California.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Quirt

customer_reviews.title: Absolute for techies
customer_reviews.text: Love it...our private water company was attempting to impose a monthly water budget program which everyone opposed. Oh did I mention the most absurd aspect I live in Western Washington. Back to the point. I have had it for over 6 months and and saved over 65% as oppposed to standard controllers that watered even when it rained. With the NOAA weather connectivity it is awesome....the enntire unit set it and forget it. Love the reports it generates and sends to my cell phone. Finally I love the connectivity to my Iphone and access wherever I am.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Moore

customer_reviews.title: Fabulously easy to use interface and install
customer_reviews.text: Fabulously easy to use interface and easy install. This is a huge step forward from the "big name" irrigation company controllers that seem to emulate their gear driven predecessors. Programmed schedules are simple to create. Stations can be named sensibly and customized for type of vegetation. Internet access by phone makes sprinkler head adjustment/replacement much less a chore. Even manually running stations is easier. Each station you turn on is queued so you don't need to wait for one to finish before queueing the next. Almost forgot to mention.... An AC power adapter was included with the machine. Wife LOVES having such convenient control and feedback Should have gotten this ages ago.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kuo

customer_reviews.title: Super easy setup. Wifi weather adjustments to watering amount works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy setup and moving the wires over from my old "dumb" irrigation controller. The weather updates work well, haven't bothered to reconnect my old rain sensor as it does a good job scaling back watering on its own based on ambient light and rain conditions. Love the integration with the web portal for input all programming changes, also the iPhone app (I use an iPhone X now and it works flawlessly) is great. Love the ability to walk around and turn on and off valves/zones from my phone as I do inspections and repairs. Overall a great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Robert D., Bay Area, CA

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very easy to setup and works flawlessly so far. I just used the recommended watering times and they are working great. I believe the device works off the Android operating system. It has that kind of feel, and runs very smoothly. Swipe works well and it has an excellent keyboard. Part of that is the great touch screen, but part is because the OS is well established, not like some cheap custom interface that you find with some products that are trying to lead the technological market.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product zero stars I would. Uses the tiniest slots for your wiring. My wiring gauge was far too thick. then the slots for each zone are much too close together. Comes with an adapter to use a standard plugin as most people that need 16 zones have constant power with a ground wire. Terrible wiring design made this product useless and it never even powered up after it was wired correctly. Pure JUNK!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good reliability
customer_reviews.text: Used all 2018 season. Easy to use and program. A few spotty issue with wifi connection issues but not enough to be concerned about. Love the link to weather forecasts for smart watering. Now notice and laugh at others who are watering their yards while it is raining.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M.

customer_reviews.title: Installs and runs in minutes
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to replace a dead OpenSprinkler. Installation was done in 5 minutes. Setup took less than that. Minor things: The included screwdriver is of such low quality that the shaft rotates in the grip. If a company includes something like this it should better not include a screwdriver at all. In the GUI It is beyond me why radio buttons have to be selected and additionally, an 'apply' button has to be pressed to keep a selection. GUI, in general, is pretty convoluted.
customer_reviews.author: miles99

customer_reviews.title: Great - especially if you want a "weather based system".
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit- and very capable. However to use it as a local controller with remote operation (i.e. no weather adjustments) - the unit is a bit complex to use for a non-tech person. All the features are there - and it can do everything - but it is highly focused on forecasting and weather. Not my desire - but can't knock it operationally. Plus it is a PRETTY unit. Just not for me
customer_reviews.author: JimH

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for an irrigation system controller, but worth it for me.
customer_reviews.text: This was a case of spending more than I needed to for more than I needed, but I don't regret it. Compared to the 10 year old irrigation controller that came with my house when I moved in, this is AMAZING. The best feature is being able to control it from my phone. Not having to run between the back yard and the garage 10 times while doing the annual sprinkler blow-out was almost enough to rationalize it just for that. :)
customer_reviews.author: Steven E. Summers

customer_reviews.title: How bad can it be?...yes, that bad!
customer_reviews.text: Would be great if it operated as described. However, it often doesn’t respond to commands (app or local), and when it does appear to respond, the command isn’t executed...so you think it irrigated but didn’t. Finally, when it does respond and execute commands, it reboots after entering a second command. This is the fourth rain machine product I’ve had and it will be my last. All four hv either had constant problems or failed after 14 months or less.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.  Easy to customize.  Internet access works great.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! The water use adjustments work very well, and the watering programs are very customizable. Access via the internet has been very reliable. I installed this myself; it was very easy and took me about 30 minutes. The only hiccup so far is my unit will not connect to Weather Underground. I get a URL error. Otherwise, a good irrigation controller.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Just Do It!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Allowed me to get rid of three very old Rain Bird timers. Easy to adjust and nice to see I am saving some water. I am getting a $150 rebate from EBMUD so this is a no-brainer. There are other systems that have a sensor that monitors the weather at your house rather than this one which rely's on an area forecast. Not sure if in the long run it will make much difference. A definite improvement and should save water.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: With out question you'll recieve the BEST device if you buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing device that connects well to home automation systems. Precise control of watering anything that needs H2O! EASY to set up ; very intuitive . Not expensive for what it does. And will safe money on water bill and plant costs. The folks that make it are excellent. My first unit came damaged- immediately replaced it! I'm a very busy practicing physician - but was so impressed by this piece of technology I've taken time to offer my experience. This is the sort of tech that wine makes in NAPA use to care for their very valuable crops!
customer_reviews.author: P. W. Sturm MD

customer_reviews.title: great device, no more attempts at manually adjusting with ...
customer_reviews.text: great device, no more attempts at manually adjusting with knobs and buttons, can set individual stations to desired times or go with the recommended setting for your area. One of the greatest aspects of this system is that it does not turn on when it has rained like my old system did in the past. It downloads the weather reports and you get weather updates on your phone daily
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a controller that you set and then forget.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the RainMachine a few years ago to replace an old timer controller. The product must have been new to the market because there were a lot of bugs in the iOS application. Those issues have been resolved and I love the product. This is a controller that you set and then forget.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Fisher

customer_reviews.title: great little controller
customer_reviews.text: I love this controller. Very easy to setup. Many features to select proper soil type, grass/tree/plant, watches for many different environmental variables. So far i have saved 118781 gallons of water since installing a few months back. Would definitely buy again and recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: abelenkiy

customer_reviews.title: I'm on the fence on this. I have two ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the fence on this. I have two of them, and they won't talk to each other which is a negative. I have talked to support, and they don't seem to have an answer. I have been through all the setting hundreds of times, and I don't get much efficiency out of these. I think in hindsight, I'd choose a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Iceburg

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal, easy to install and works as advertised. I had trouble with my first model and tech support was excellent. Tried to work it out and when it didn’t fix the problem got a new device. I feel like Iron Man that I control my sprinklers anytime from any place. Programming and manual controls are like butter. I haven’t been this happy since the birth of my second child. Must buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: JMAX

customer_reviews.title: The RainMachine is excellent!
customer_reviews.text: The RainMachine is excellent! It is very easy to install and easily connects to wifi and the weather service. When installing the system, if you have a master valve (or pump) you will need to wire this to zone one and select the mast value option. Setting the system up was easy and intuitive. The app works great on my iPhone and the web based site is very convenient if you done want to do setups on the control panel or your phone. The system works well with the weather reports, adjusting the watering duration and you can also set it to take wind sensitivity into consideration.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Best smart Irrigation Controller
customer_reviews.text: control through smart phone from any place, user friendly app, easy to install, supports IFFT, qualified for water saving rebates.
customer_reviews.author: Tanbir

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to setup
customer_reviews.text: Works great, this thing is so easy to setup, I have a large yard and the valves are far away from the controller, so now I can test the valves with out walking back to the house. I like having a display on the controller. Some don't have one.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and saving me money
customer_reviews.text: So far this sprinkler controller has saved me $100's of dollars on irrigation. The one my builder put in was cheap and it had trouble knowing when it rained. The RainMachine is crazy good about not watering when it's raining, or even forecasted to rain. It can even calculate how much rain you've had and will get and will adjust the amount of watering. More than impressed, this is a must for anyone with a large yard.
customer_reviews.author: inxs4

customer_reviews.title: Remote control of sprinklers is the best feature.
customer_reviews.text: Works well and qualifies for a rebate from our state water conservancy district. I expecially like the ability to turn on sprinkler zones from my iphone while I am out inspecting them. Another convenience is the ability to program watering every 2nd day instead of the same days of the week each week. I am less concerned with its promoted ability to adjest sprinkler times based on weather forecasts.
customer_reviews.author: bobscof

customer_reviews.title: Great controller
customer_reviews.text: After 3yrs of dealing with a rain bird controller that constantly failed and changed settings every power outage. I purchased this rain machine. Very easy install even easier set up. Weather app helps save a ton of water . System is constant and reliable. Getting watering updates of phone lets me know if my lawn is watered. I was hesitant about updating system as other reviewers said their system froze after. But all is well.
customer_reviews.author: W SULLIVAN

customer_reviews.title: Robust, stylish, and a must-have for anyone with a garden
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 of these devices and have been 100% satisfied with the hardware, the UI and the app. The app has a few bugs, but nothing that impacts its usability.
customer_reviews.author: Assana Waylonis

customer_reviews.title: Installation was very easy. Came with a small screwdriver for the wire ...
customer_reviews.text: I just installed the RainMachine and replaced a Hunter Pro controller. Installation was very easy. Came with a small screwdriver for the wire screws which i really appreciated. I only had one Control wire, and was a little confused when the instructions said use one control wire for up to 8 zones. I have 12 zones and one control wire works fine. The unit quickly connected to my home wifi. I downloaded the iPhone app, named the zones, set up a program, and tested the system. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: jd6019

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by how well these work.  Love'em.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these units to control 2 systems. I absolutely love them. I have 12 zones on 1 system and 7 on the other. So far I have only used the iPhone app and I love how intuitive it is. As an iOS developer myself, I know the user interface is often the hardest part. The app is extremely well thought out and easy to navigate and use. I read reviews for Irrigation Caddy, Rachio and RainMachine before deciding to try RainMachine. I'm sure I made the right choice. I haven't used all the advanced features yet but it's nice to know they will be there later in the year when I will need them.
customer_reviews.author: Mick M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice to use. Goodby Toro....
customer_reviews.text: Using it for about 3 months now and so far its great. Really enjoy being able to configure the sprinklers from the iPad. Some of the zone setup system is a little confusing and you don't always understand what criteria it is using to adjust the watering time. They need to make sure the software does not try to be too smart. Will be nice if they can make it work with wireless moisture sensors.
customer_reviews.author: mhamilton

customer_reviews.title: everything else is GREAT, LOVE the product and now it is 100 ...
customer_reviews.text: mfg had to work out some bugs with how the "use water data" function worked when you had it off, but I was one of the first to buy the product. They responded to me quickly and fixed all the bugs in their first update. everything else is GREAT, LOVE the product and now it is 100 times easier to set up to work with the app on your phone. also has a lot of cool data like watering history that the older version did not have. GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: William Toro

customer_reviews.title: Easy and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome! Old controller was tough to program, this one couldn't be easier! Love that I can manage it from my phone or from the controller itself! Couple of things I'd like to see changed in future updates is to be able to run multiple zones at once and that the app takes you straight to the home page without having to click on which machine you're using. Other than those two things I couldn't ask for anything better!!!
customer_reviews.author: jMcCleary

customer_reviews.title: Main Pump Valve could Take up a Zone
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The only thing is if you have a main valve, it will consume one of your zones. That's not clearly articulated. So while I have 16 zones on the RainMachine I can only use 15.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! I've bought 3 of these units so far for various homes. Only complaint I wish they would come out with a bigger station unit beside the 16 station! As a side note: I would strongly recommend against using any upgraded delivery service by Amazon to get your product sooner. It was a total waste of my money!! Didn't receive the product until late at night. Shameful!
customer_reviews.author: Jetsetter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I had to pay well above MSRP because it was out of stock almost everywhere but well worth it. The touch screen interface is great and so is the iPhone app and web interface. I can name all my zones and control them from anywhere. Love it. So glad my old controller with the damn mechanical switches died!
customer_reviews.author: Morpheus

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, much better than old Rainbird/Ortho manual controllers
customer_reviews.text: Installed myself, and the unit has been fully operational for a couple of months. No issues, no down time. I haven't studied the water savings that this device promotes just yet, although its great to be able to turn on, turn off or schedule right through the smartphone app. I'd buy this again - in California, this qualifies for a water savings rebate as a "water efficient controller".
customer_reviews.author: J. Hazeltine

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and setup. Only problem is that alexa recognizes my zones as a light source. I shouldn’t recognize them at all. Maybe some day it will have alexa control capabilities. Meanwhile, I have devised a work around.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick K. Knauer

customer_reviews.title: Makes all other sprinkler controllers seem like light switches.
customer_reviews.text: If you would rather CONTROL your sprinkler instead of letting it control you, than buy this controller. There are many imitators out there, but this one has the best integration with weather services, open source software, and uses FREE services (NOAA, etc) to provide weather data. Buy it once, install the phone app, and enjoy not wasting water.
customer_reviews.author: Ben M.

customer_reviews.title: Wireless works well from a distance. Unit is Not weather protected.
customer_reviews.text: Working perfectly. Very happy. Even has the master pump zone. Text alerts, but no email notification like their competitor. Onscreen controls unlike their competitor. The only thing is that you'll have to buy an enclosure if you keep it outside. I converted my RainBird box. Figure that cost in.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Easy Setup :)
customer_reviews.text: Easy to transfer wiring from old controller to this one. Range to receive WiFi is very good and the account setup is easy. I start watering remote using my iPad 👌🏼 I will buy another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: joe peter pena

customer_reviews.title: Really good system
customer_reviews.text: Took a few calls and emails to adjust my wiring. I went from a very complex hardware set up to this simple one so it was a bit difficult. Once I figured it out it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Elluminati

customer_reviews.title: Modern Sprinkler System Control
customer_reviews.text: Seamless integration into my UBNT network at home. Configuration could not be easier; the fact that I no longer have to worry about the sprinklers going off during a freeze is worth the price alone! Not tied to a proprietary cloud data source either.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Quit after three years
customer_reviews.text: Great while it lasted but after three years it won't communicate with the outside world. Customer support is non existent. Maybe I'm wrong in thinking that for this kind of money it should last longer than three years?
customer_reviews.author: Picollini

customer_reviews.title: This is the water controller you are looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is as advertised. Also qualified us for a local discount. Stops watering on rainy day, win! Phone all is easy to use, remote access could be a little better but not a deal breaker by any means
customer_reviews.author: topraman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the control of my sprinklers right at my finger tip! Easy to walk my yard and hit play on the zones I want to watch. Makes adjusting the sprinklers and checking for any broken ones easy. I also like how I can take a picture for each zone, so I can easily identify which zone it is. The best part is how it saves water based on the weather!
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN

customer_reviews.title: 2+ Years and Running -- this product is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this system now for 2+ years and I love it!!! The app is amazing, I love that it adjusts based on local weather. Can't endorse this product enough. The touchscreen is so nice to have, but the app is amazing, and so is the website control.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L

customer_reviews.title: Great sprinkler controller
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best sprinkler controller on the market. Program from 1 second to as long as you want. No need for internet connections to run. Very friendly user interface.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenience.
customer_reviews.text: I consolidated 16 zones from 2 controllers down to the Touch HD-16. I recently had to fix a broken line, swap out multiple heads and adjust a number of others. Not having to run in and out of the garage was a major convenience. While I did have an issue with the website accessing the controller last week, the mobile app was able to connect just fine. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cooks

customer_reviews.title: Impressed so far
customer_reviews.text: Setup was easy. The interface on the device and the app is very, very intuitive. The design team really thought this thing through. Programming zones and schedules was easy. I replaced a very sophisticated RainBird modular zone controller with a master valve, and was surprised this unit could do everything the RainBird could. I don't know what the weather prediction will do, but so far I am impressed. The documentation and setup screens make no mentioned how to configure a master valve but I found it by accident under Zone 1 config.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Saves time, saves money
customer_reviews.text: Every time I start my watering program from my phone, and every time I see that it didn't water the lawn because it had rained (or was going to rain), I think 'this is the best money I ever spent'. Worth every penny, literally.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works very nice right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: It works very nice right out of the box. It took about five minutes to install and another five minutes to setup on my phone and iPad. it been working just as I programed it ever since it was installed. I would buy it again if I buy a new house.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Darwish

customer_reviews.title: Just get it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to wire up an setup. I love the cloud-free operation. I only wish it had water meter support.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer #14

customer_reviews.title: Best idea ever
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, removed the old Hunter pro C, and installed new unit, I did have to install a power plug since is didn't want to use the hunter transformer. Called tech support and they told me how to wire the outdoor rain sensor.
customer_reviews.author: ronmax11

customer_reviews.title: Nice combination of a smart and traditional sprinkler control.
customer_reviews.text: The device is perfect. The app could be a little more user friendly. It adapts well to changing weather patterns. We are really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Just got it a few weeks ago so don't have too much time with it but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: Could not ask for better
customer_reviews.text: Bought this timer at the beginning of the summer. Has saved me miles of walking and has performed perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Natemun

customer_reviews.title: Love this controller
customer_reviews.text: was really easy to setup and get going. Transfered connections off the old dial based controllers that came with the house. Easy to mount, easy to configure. Very happy with my purchase so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sean J Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great irrigation timer
customer_reviews.text: Great irrigation timer. The five day forecast across the beautiful Lcd screen is awesome and the application to control this device is very easy to use. Also, the unit as pratically free with rebates!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Just wish the weather report can be a bit more ...
customer_reviews.text: Just wish the weather report can be a bit more accurate. I know it's not their fault as they have to out source the weather from NOAA. But still wish it can be more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Naughty Garfield

customer_reviews.title: Looks and functions great! Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Looks and functions great! Love this product. Have puchased another one for my Fathers house and will be buying 3 for my company.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Able to control the sprinklers via the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Able to control the sprinklers via the app on my phone. If the grass is getting brown, I can easily change the schedule. Has already paid for itself within 9 months as I can restrict water usage very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Deepak Varshney

customer_reviews.title: Set and Forget!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, very easy to use, user-friendly definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sprinkler system. Very easy to install, operate, and control with phone or tablet. Love this system.
customer_reviews.author: Chovis38

customer_reviews.title: Love this was easy to install and setup which is ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this was easy to install and setup which is the main reason I purchased it. The app and WIFI capability are very awesome and so far it has worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything I had hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, easy to setup, and easy to use. I am very satisfied so far and having the ability to test zones and your pump with your phone makes things much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Super easy and flexible
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Super simple to install, super easy to program and amazingly flexible.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up and interface via the web, Android app and Alexa. Working flawlessly thus far.
customer_reviews.author: E Dudzik

customer_reviews.title: Awesome unit. Very easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: Awesome unit. Very easy to setup and use. It's using a custom Android OS, which means it's very easy to type in names and change settings. It's also nice to be able to see the forecast while in the garage.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Everything it promised
customer_reviews.text: Sets up easy, works great. Trouble-shooting irrigation issues is easy when I can walk around my yard and start or stop any sprinkler from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Beanpole

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and they easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Reasonably easy to change from the Rainbird controller. Like the ability of remotely controlling via smart phone.
customer_reviews.author: Glenbo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed. Super easy to setup, and great iPhone, iPad and web user interface. Well recommended.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Good

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works as expected. Great iOS app and WEB app for laptop. Easy to use, easy to set up. Love the product.
customer_reviews.author: George Tarter

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Easy to setup and configure
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to setup and configure. I even sold my 10-year old RainBird in eBay for $100! So I really only paid $200 for this upgrade. It "just works,"
customer_reviews.author: Bill Hummel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. It took more time to remove old ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. It took more time to remove old system . RainMachine is so simple to install and setup. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Belali

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had this years ago. I'm saving so much on my watering during those rainy days.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Gram

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly Interface.  Great form factor.
customer_reviews.text: Simple User Friendly Interface. Just connect to your network and handle all the setup from the convenience of your phone or computer. Reporting and automatic adjustments according to weather data a most for people in CA.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Friese

customer_reviews.title: Pays for itself!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Will pay for itself in one season. Easy install, great tech support. Buy this controller, you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Guitar Garage

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, whether set up was little tricky while worth it when you get it set up
customer_reviews.text: Save up to 50% on unnecessary watering first month awesome
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Elleby

customer_reviews.title: Great controller.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Easy to use, very flexible programming. Simple to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and setup - works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: easy to install and setup - works pretty good. I used the Caddy before and this one is by far the best one.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Grimberg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! easy to setup and install
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! easy to setup and install. Had one question and got great phone support on a Saturday!
customer_reviews.author: Kdub

customer_reviews.title: Needs an OS update.
customer_reviews.text: It forgets the ISP address if the router is shut off. An OS update is needed.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Did not perform as advertised, at least in my yard
customer_reviews.text: Never got the product to work properly. Gave up and bought another Rainbird
customer_reviews.author: Doug Scott

product_meta.title: RainMachine Touch HD-16, Cloud Independent Smart Wi-Fi Irrigation Controller, Compatible with Alexa, 16 Zones
product_meta.description:
Size:16 Zones

RainMachine Touch HD, Cloud Independent, Touch, 12/16 Zones Wi-Fi Smart Irrigation Controller, Compatible with Alexa



The Wi-Fi Forecast Sprinkler. Conserve water.

The RainMachine sprinkler controller automatically adjusts your watering amount by lowering it on rainy or colder days and increasing it on hot summer days. The system not only saves water but it also protects your plants. The versatility of each program is unprecedented: select individual weekdays, Even/Odd day mode, Cycle and Soak, or Station Delay. Run the programs one-at-a-time, sequentially or even in parallel! The RainMachine Wi-Fi sprinkler timer is designed to handle possible conflicts, like simultaneous commands to the same valve or overlapping schedules.

NOAA. A weather-ready nation.

Your RainMachine sprinkler controller connects via WIFI and gets the best weather data available on earth. NOAA employs satellites, radars, weather stations, and highly qualified meteorologists, delivering the most accurate weather forecast on the planet. Complex mathematical models that run on huge data centers are free for you to use in your garden. Yes, free, already paid from your tax money. Using your exact street location, the RainMachine sprinkler timer downloads precise weather data, accommodating to specific micro-climates. Let it rain!

No data? No problem. Switch to statistics.

When no forecast data is available the RainMachine will automatically switch to historical weather statistics. This way the RainMachine conserves water even if the Internet goes down.

Garden from any screen. Easy connect. Easy control.

Garden from iPhone, garden from Android, garden from any screen. The application automatically discovers all RainMachines on your local network and makes them accessible through an easy to use and secure interface.

http://www.rainmachine.com
feature_bullets: Smart schedule & save water - save water With real-time weather adjustments. (Epa Water Sense certified, check for rebates)
Cloud independent - all personal data stored locally. Rain Machine continues to work even when Wi-Fi is down.
FREE WEATHER DATA - Direct access to NOAA, METNO or Wunderground, Open Weather Map, NetAtmo. Use National or Personal Weather Stations for pinpoint accuracy.
Control from anywhere - color touch screen, iPhone, and Android, PC browser access with dashboard stats. Works from home, work or vacation. Indoor use only
UPDATED MODEL (2019) - Improved WIFI. hundreds of Schedule and UI improvements. Integrate with Alexa, Google Home, Nest, WINK, SmartThings via IFTTT.
